welcome_page_text_description:
Thank you for choosing PikaOS!
This welcome screen will help guide you through the
available resources for PikaOS as well as help you setup 
your computer to your liking.

Enjoy!
The PikaOS team
update-pikaos-subtitle: Update all applications and system packages.
install-media-codec-title: Install Patented Media Codecs and Libraries
install-media-codec-subtitle:
Get media codecs and libraries (Such as : FFMPEG, and VA-API)
which are needed for many creative applications 
and provide hardware accelerated video playback/decoding and encoding.
open-driver-manager-subtitle:
A driver utility to install various driver such as the
proprietary NVIDIAÂ® drivers that significantly increase performance for NVIDIA cards 
and microcode for CPUs and such.
open-kernel-manager-subtitle: A utility to mange kernel versions and SCX schedulers.
open-software-manager-title: Install more apps from the Software Manager
open-software-manager-subtitle: Install and update software using the PikaOS Software Manager.
open-webapp-manager-subtitle:
Install WebApps with your favourite web browser as a backend. Turn your favourite WebApps into 
native desktop applications.
pika-gameutils-meta-subtitle:
A meta package that installs: Steam, Lutris, Goverlay + Mangohud, Wine, Winetricks, VKBasalt, 
and many more...
protonup-qt-subtitle:
A tool for managing the Proton GE Compatibility tool for Steam Play based on Wine and additional components made by GloriousEggroll
this tool allows steam to run windows games natively on linux.
pika-gameutils-meta-extra-title: Install the PikaOS Game Utilites Extras
pika-gameutils-meta-extra-subtitle: Installs Heroic Game Launcher and Bottles Along side the base gameutils package
fabiscafe-devices-title: Install Device Configrations for many controllers and VR equipment
fabiscafe-devices-subtitle:
Installs udev rule configrations for many HID Devices
for more info see: https://codeberg.org/fabiscafe/game-devices-udev
ttf-mscorefonts-installer-subtitle: Installs TrueType Microsoft fonts and emulate Windows' font rendering.
kdenlive-subtitle: KDE Non-Linear Video Editor an open source video editor built on Qt and the KDE Frameworks libraries.
krita-subtitle: KDE Krita is a professional FREE and open source painting program.
libreoffice-subtitle:
LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice.org 
(commonly known as OpenOffice).
blender-subtitle: Blender is the free and open source 3D creation suite. It supports the entirety of the 3D pipeline.
obs-subtitle: Open Broadcaster Software the free and open source software for video recording and live streaming.
open-pika-gnome-layouts-subtitle: Choose a desktop layout and accent color for Gnome.
contribute-gitea-subtitle: Contribute code or open issues and pull request to PikaOS Github.
translate-weblate-subtitle: Translate our Applications to your language.
join-discord-subtitle: Join PikaOS Official Discord, and chat with the developers.
open-pika-wiki-title-subtitle: Check for known issues and their solutions.
